DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat,apply #b1 #yEtch to All enemy.

RingOfDestiny:DemonicContract.NAME: Demonic Contract
DESCRIPTIONS: #ySacrifice will gain different effect ： NL Succubus：Gain #b1 #ySoul #yStone. NL Demon：Gain #b4 #yMetallicize . NL Vampire:Apply #b3 #yWeaken to All Enemy.

DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of combat,if you are in #pDarkness,gain #b1 Max HP,otherwise Heal #b3 HP.
